body_html:
We're using pyjexl to validate filter expressions now.

fetch('/api/v1/recipe/100/', {
  method: 'PATCH',
  credentials: 'include',
  headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-CSRFToken': 'SNIP'},
  body: JSON.stringify({extra_filter_expression:  '[invalid)'})
})
.then(res => res.json())
.then(data => console.log(JSON.stringify(data))) 

// {"extra_filter_expression":["Could not parse expression: [invalid)"]}
